summary: bat file to set player stats to 1000, as well as 0 shout cool down.
descriptionHtml:
If you're like me, you've been playing Skyrim for a while. After my 800th or so playthrough, I kinda got sick of the grind, and just wanted a super character
from the get go. This problem was slightly fixed when I found Adrianus92's mod Max Skills and All Perks - FOMod Install (found here http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48858/?) my problem was almost resolved. However, I still had to manually balance out my health, 
magicka, stamina, carry weight, and shout cool down stats. So, I created these 2 little files to do it for me.

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS
1. Manually install the two files, and drop them into your Skyrim Data folder.
That's it.

USAGE IN GAME
1. Open the console (~)
2. If using Adrianus92's mod in conjunction with this mod, use his command first. If not, go to step 3.
3. Type in "bat setskill" without the quotation marks.
4. Follow up on that command with "bat forceskill" this will lock the stats in place. (They won't revert when loading a save)

And that should be it. I'm new to the Nexus, at least on the uploader side of things, but I hope you enjoy the little cheat.
Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year!
author: ZeNo1234567890
